About Vincent

Let me tell you a few things about myself!

BIO

Hello! I'm Vincent, a passionate and devoted programmer currently in my final year of Master's degree in I.T (Computer Science) with a current GPA of 6.636 out of 7. As an aspiring skilled Software Engineer, I am continuously working hard to improve my tech skills. As a newbie programmer, I have a good fundamental knowledge of HTML, CSS, Javascript, and Java.

On the other hand, I love learning new things and also engage with problem-solving activities such as numerical and logical games. As a hard-working individual, I have shown to work well under pressure both independently and in a team context. These characteristics were brew from many years of working in a fast-paced customer-service focused industries accompanying participating in social basketball competitions.

Give me a chance and I will surprise you.
